anime.description: The science-fiction adventure story takes place 46 million light years away from Earth in the Sombrero Galaxy on a planet named Milky. The alien boy Kid, who refers to himself as Space`s #1 Pilot, uses a Power Crystal to modify his spaceship and travel through dimensions. Source: ANN Note: Happening Star distributed at the Sunshine Creation doujinshi event on January 22, 2012.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
